title: Packet Loss
body:
So ever since the server move, I've been getting random lag spikes where my ping will jump from 60 to anywhere in the ballpark of 600-1000+.  I'm located in NE and I have Time Warner Cable internet.  I've tried resetting my router and having a technician from TWC come out to fix the connection.
Also, the lag is really weird sometimes, where the only thing affected is whether I can move/use abilities.  I can still see everyone else moving and I can type messages.
Although other times I just randomly disconnect from the game for about 30ish seconds.  I don't really know what to do to fix it beyond what I've tried already. Any suggestions?
Also, I'm using a wired connection, not wifi.

replies.body: I recommend following the troubleshooting guide on [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/205238344-NA-Server-Move-FAQ), and if that doesn't help then send us a [Player Support request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your logs. :)

> [{quoted}](name=2o2,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pwj1T3yt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-03T09:10:43.409+0000)
>
> I recommend following the troubleshooting guide on [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/205238344-NA-Server-Move-FAQ), and if that doesn't help then send us a [Player Support request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your logs. :)

please stop suggesting this, it never works.

I am also having this problem.  Huge lag.  When I am on the loading screen, my ping is at around 50 and then spikes to 120 every now and then.  Once i'm in game, the ping is 120 + huge lag spikes of 500.  I also have Time Warner Cable and located in Texas
I have Time Warner as well and this is happening to me in Florida!
I'm not having packet loss, but my ping has not dropped below 400 sincd Patch 5.17 went live. I had great ping before this, and my ping/internet is fine except for connecting to league.
Im also having that problem, the only response i seen is from korensky telling someone thats its TWC issue and not theres, but here we are.. from SC Georgia Maine VA ... with problems playing league

Yeah I am having the exact same issue down here in South Carolina. I did send you a player support request with my logs and basically got back a generic "we are working on it" response, which I appreciate but as of right now I am completely unable to play the game.  It just seems from searching these forums that there are many people having this issue but there doesn't seem to be a direct response from riot about whats being done about it.  I could be wrong but I mean this seems to be affecting a large number of people and it has honestly cost me in ranked a couple times now. I am not getting any loss prevented so there is no point in playing anymore until I see some indication that something is being done to help resolve the situation.
